name: Match 'n Flip
description:
Match cards by number or color to clear all piles! Enjoy a unique puzzle game and win cash and real prizes! Available on iPhone & iPad.

Key Features:
—Free match card games available at any time.

—Get matched with other players of your skill level, play fair matching card games, and win exciting prizes and rewards.

—No ads, uninterrupted gaming experience.

—Tournaments, 1v1 competitions and multiplayer games of your choice. Various prize pools to choose from. Practice your skills before playing higher stakes.

—100% safe and secure withdrawal via PayPal.

1V1 GAMES
Match your skills against another player at your level, and compete for real cash prizes!

TOURNAMENTS
Play against multiple other players in brackets. The higher up your final place is, the bigger prize you get!

CASH & REAL PRIZES
Cashing out your winnings is easy and secured by PayPal. In addition, you can also win and redeem real prizes including Airpods Pro, iPad, Instax Camera, coffee makers, and so much more!

If you have questions and concerns, please contact: support@pocket7games.com
